directions.step:
Mix flour, baking powder, and salt together. Cut in the shortening until it is evenly mixed with the dry ingredients. Then ADD, Milk, mixing well.
Then Knead for a a 1/2 minute and roll out to about 1-1/2 inch in thickness. Cut with a Biscuit cutter. Place the biscuits 1-1/2 inches apart on a greased baking sheet. The BRUSH with the Milk and BAKE at 450F oven degrees 10-12 minutes
One biscuit may be Exchanged for: 1 bread exchange or 1 fat exchange.
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
